Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: PRODAJA - KUĆA S 3 STANA - BANJOL Prodajemo samostojeću kuću na Rabu, Banjol ukupne površine 250m2. Udaljena je 4min vožnje automobilom od centra Raba, rive i ribarnice. Od najbliže trgovine i ljekarne udaljena je 600m. Kuća je izgrađena na parceli površine 437m2 te se sastoji od prizemlja, prvoga kata i potkrovlja. Na svakom katu je po jedan stan. U prizemlju se nalazi stan površine 90m2 koji se sastoji od ulaza, kupaonice, dnevnog boravka, kuhinje i blagovaonice i 2 spavaće sobe. Na prvom katu je stan površine 90m2 koji se sastoji od ulaza, kupaonice, dnevnog boravka, kuhinje i blagovaonice i 4 spavaće sobe. Stan površine 69m2 nalazi se u potkrovlju kuće te se sastoji od kupaonice, dnevnog boravka, kuhinje i blagovaonice i 2 spavaće sobe. Stan u potkrovlju ima klima uređaj. Svi stanovi imaju balkon. Svaki stan ima odvojen ulaz i povezani su vanjskim stepeništem. Ispred kuće nalazi se parking za 3 automobila i roštilj. Vlasništvo uredno, 1/1 ! Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Zadar SALE - HOUSE WITH 3 APARTMENTS - BANJOL We're selling a detached house in Rab, Banjol, with a total area of 250 m2. It's a 4min driving distance from the center of Rab, the sea and the fish market. The nearest supermarket and pharmacy is 600 m away. The house was built on a plot of 437m2 and consists of the ground floor, the first floor and the attic. There's one apartment on each floor. On the ground floor there is an apartment of 90m2 consisting of an entrance, bathroom, living room, kitchen and dining room and 2 bedrooms. On the first floor is an apartment of 90m2 consisting of an entrance, bathroom, living room, kitchen and dining room and 4 bedrooms. The 69m2 apartment is located in the attic of the house and consists of a bathroom, living room, kitchen and dining room and 2 bedrooms. The apartment has the air condition. All the apartments have balconies. Each apartment has a separate entrance and is connected by an external staircase. There's a three-car parking lot and a barbecue in front of the house. Ownership 1/1 ! Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Zadar
